attributes.action: Toughen lockdown restrictions nationwide to totally irradiate Coronavirus 2021
attributes.additional_details: To irradiate Coronavirus so that businesses and peoples lives in the long term can get back to some sort of normality.
attributes.background: Put the military on the streets and only allow people to leave their homes to purchase food or animal feed. Make all non essential businesses close completely. Have one last big push similar to what other countries did last March to completely get rid of Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156
